Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: Personally I feel more nervous receiving feedback from my teacher as it is in person

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: Feedback from teacher - especially in class can sometimes not be as thorough, as they do not have the time to explain in depth with other students in the class also wanting feedback. With AI you have the opportunity to take as much time and they can provide much deeper feedback whenever.
